info.title: InfrastructureInsightsManagementClient
info.description: The Admin Infrastructure Insights Management Client.

get.description: Returns a list of support REST operations.

criticalAlertCount.description: The number of critical alerts for the service.

warningAlertCount.description: The number of warning alerts for the service.

BaseHealth.description: Models the base properties for health resource.

description.description: The localized, friendly description for the operation. The description will be displayed to the user. It should be thorough and concise for used in both tooltips and detailed views.

operation.description: The localized, friendly name for the operation. Use the name as it will be displayed to the user.

provider.description: The localized, friendly version of the resource provider name. The provider name is expected to include the name of the publisher or company responsible. The provider name format should use title case and begin with "Microsoft" for first-party services. For example, the provider name may be"Microsoft Monitoring Insights" or "Microsoft Compute".

resource.description: The localized, friendly version of the resource type related to this action or operation; the resource type should match the public documentation for the resource provider.

Display.description: Contains the localized display information for this particular operation / action.

name.description: The name of the operation performed on the object. The name should match the action name that appears in RBAC or the event service.

nextLink.description: URI to the next page of operations.

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

Resource.description: The core properties of ARM resources

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

TrackedResource.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Subscription credentials that uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

azure_auth.description: Authorization uses an Azure Active Directory OAuth2 flow.
